error.store_domain_reserved: Selected domain is reserved for internal use. Please choose another domain.
error.store_domain_exists: Selected domain is already in use by another store. Please choose another domain.

store-name.label: Name
store-name.v8n_required: Please enter the name of your store
store-name.v8n_too_long: Please reduce the name of your store to 50 characters or less

logo-url.label: Logo URL
logo-url.v8n_too_long: Please shorten this link to 200 characters of less

store-domain.label: Domain
store-domain.custom_domain_note: To use a custom domain, you must order (at no cost) an SSL certificate through Foxy. This option is only for developers who have full control of their domain settings and may take a few days to fully process.
store-domain.v8n_required: Please enter the domain of your store
store-domain.v8n_invalid: Please enter a valid domain. For internationalized domain names, please use punycode.
store-domain.v8n_unavailable: Selected domain is already in use by another store. Please choose another domain.
store-domain.v8n_too_long: Please use a domain that is 100 characters or less

store-url.label: Website
store-url.v8n_required: Please enter the URL of your online store
store-url.v8n_too_long: Please use a URL that is 300 characters or less

is-maintenance-mode.label: Maintenance mode
is-maintenance-mode.helper_text: When enabled, your customers can't make purchases or use the checkout page in any way. Once you're done making changes, disable this mode to continue getting orders.

store-email.label: Emails for billing and communication with Foxy
store-email.placeholder: Enter an email and press Enter
store-email.caption: Submit
store-email.v8n_required: Please enter at least one email
store-email.v8n_too_long: All emails for this store must fit within 300 characters when comma-separated

country.label: Country
country.v8n_required: Please select the country of your store

region.label: Region (state, province, etc.)
region.v8n_required: Please select the region of your store
region.v8n_too_long: Please shorten the region name to 50 characters of less

postal-code.label: Postal (zip) code
postal-code.v8n_required: Please enter the postal code of your store

use-single-secret.label: Use a universal store secret
use-single-secret.helper_text: When enabled, we will use the same secret for cart signing, legacy API, XML datafeed and SSO. Note that changing this setting will invalidate all existing secrets.

webhook-key.label: Universal store secret
webhook-key.v8n_required: Please create a universal store secret.
webhook-key.v8n_too_long: Please shorten this value to 100 characters or less.

webhook-key-api-legacy.label: Legacy API key
webhook-key-api-legacy.v8n_required: Please create a legacy API key.
webhook-key-api-legacy.v8n_too_long: Please shorten this value to 100 characters or less.

webhook-key-xml-datafeed.label: Legacy XML datafeed encryption key
webhook-key-xml-datafeed.v8n_required: Please create a legacy XML datafeed encryption key.
webhook-key-xml-datafeed.v8n_too_long: Please shorten this value to 100 characters or less.

webhook-key-sso.label: SSO secret
webhook-key-sso.v8n_too_long: Please shorten this value to 100 characters or less.

webhook-key-cart-signing.label: Cart signing key
webhook-key-cart-signing.v8n_required: Please create a cart signing key.
webhook-key-cart-signing.v8n_too_long: Please shorten this value to 100 characters or less.

from-email.label: FROM email
from-email.placeholder: Defaults to the first store email
from-email.v8n_too_long: Please use an email that is 100 characters or less

use-email-dns.label: Improve email deliverability with DNS
use-email-dns.helper_text: Before saving your changes, make sure the DNS records for your domain list our servers.

use-smtp-config.label: Use custom mail server
use-smtp-config.helper_text: If you'd like to configure your own SMTP server for sending transaction receipt emails, you can do so here.
use-smtp-config.v8n_too_long: This configuration must fit within 1000 characters when JSON-encoded

send-html-email.label: Email format
send-html-email.helper_text: This setting impacts only the main transaction receipt emails for the store.

require-signed-shipping-rates.label: Prevent shipping rate tampering
require-signed-shipping-rates.helper_text: Enabling shipping rate signing for your store ensures that the rate the customer selects is carried through and not altered in any way. If you're intending to make use of javascript snippets on your store to alter the price or label of shipping rates or add custom rates dynamically, disable this setting as it will block those rates from being applied.

features-multiship.label: Allow multiple destinations per order
features-multiship.helper_text: Enables multiple shipping addresses per order. For more information, see our wiki on multiship.

app-session-time.label: Clear cart after
app-session-time.helper_text: If your store sells products which collect personal or sensitive information as product attributes, you may want to consider lowering your cart session lifespan.

use-cart-validation.label: Prevent product link and form tampering
use-cart-validation.helper_text: Enabling this option will require all cart links and forms to pass HMAC-based verification before products can be added to the cart. You will need to sign your HTML to use this feature.
use-cart-validation.v8n_webhook_key_required: Please create a cart signing key or a universal store secret to enable this feature.

products-require-expires-property.label: My products have limited availability
products-require-expires-property.helper_text: All products added to the cart for your store will need to contain the expires property to ensure stale products can't be purchased.

webhook-key-cart-signing.label: Cart signing key
webhook-key-cart-signing.helper_text: You can edit this key in

customer-password-hash-config.label: Password hashing configuration
customer-password-hash-config.v8n_too_long: Please reduce your configuration settings to 100 characters or less

unified-order-entry-password.label: Unified order entry password
unified-order-entry-password.helper_text: Set a master password here if you would like to be able to check out as your customers without having to know their password.
unified-order-entry-password.v8n_required: Please reduce your UOE password to 100 characters

use-single-sign-on.label: Enable SSO
use-single-sign-on.helper_text: When enabled, Foxy will redirect customers to your SSO endpoint prior to hitting the checkout page. You can use this to validate items or to log customers in via your own auth provider.
use-single-sign-on.v8n_webhook_key_required: Please create an SSO secret or a universal store secret to enable this feature.

single-sign-on-url.label: SSO endpoint
single-sign-on-url.v8n_required: Please enter your SSO endpoint URL
single-sign-on-url.v8n_too_long: Please shorten this URL to 300 characters or less

webhook-key-sso.label: SSO secret
webhook-key-sso.helper_text: You can edit this secret in

receipt-continue-url.label: Return URL
receipt-continue-url.helper_text: By default, the continue button on the receipt sends the customer to the store domain after completing a purchase. Instead, you can set a specific URL here.
receipt-continue-url.v8n_too_long: Please use a URL that is 300 characters or less

bcc-on-receipt-email.label: Send a copy of each receipt to the store email(s)

custom-display-id-config.label: Identifiers
custom-display-id-config.custom-display-id-config-first-example: First ID will look like this:

use-webhook.label: Enable datafeed
use-webhook.helper_text: This is a deprecated webhook that should only be used for third-party integrations that still require it. For any new integrations where you need to trigger a webhook for each transaction on your store, we strongly recommend using the JSON webhooks.
use-webhook.v8n_webhook_key_required: Please create a legacy XML datafeed encryption key or a universal store secret to enable this feature.

webhook-url.label: Webhook URL
webhook-url.v8n_too_long: Please shorten this URL to 300 characters or less.

webhook-key-xml-datafeed.label: Encryption key
webhook-key-xml-datafeed.helper_text: You can edit this key in

hcaptcha.disclaimer: We use hCaptcha to protect this page from spam and abuse.

delete.delete_prompt: Are you sure you'd like to remove this store? You won't be able to bring it back.
